title: Topic 003 Question 002
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure Automation account named Automation1 and an Azure key vault named Vault1. Vault1 contains a secret named Secret1.
You enable a system-assigned managed identity for Automation1.
You need to ensure that Automation1 can read the contents of Secret1. The solution must meet the following requirements:
•	Prevent Automation1 from accessing other secrets stored in Vault1.
•	Follow the principle of least privilege.
options: From Vault1, configure the Access control (IAM) settings.
From Automation1, configure the Identity settings.
From Automation1, configure the Run as accounts settings.
From Secret1, configure the Access control (IAM) settings.
